00032     #define DWRITE(a, n) std::cout<<std::setw(4)<<__LINE__<<"|"<<std::setw(15)<<__func__<<"| "; std::cout.write(a, n); std::cout<<std::endl;
00033 #else

00047 //#define TCPSNIFFER
00048 #ifdef TCPSNIFFER
00049     #include <iostream>
00050     #include <sys/time.h>
00051     #include <iomanip>
00052     #include <time.h>
00053     #define SNIFFWRITE(type, data, size) { timeval timestamp; gettimeofday( &timestamp, NULL ); \
00054                            tm time_parsed; localtime_r( (time_t*)&timestamp, &time_parsed ); \
00055                            std::cout<< std::setw(2) << time_parsed.tm_hour << ":" << \
00056                            std::setw(2) << time_parsed.tm_min << ":" << \
00057                            std::setw(2) << time_parsed.tm_sec << " (" << \
00058                            std::setw(6) << timestamp.tv_usec   << ") | " << \
00059                            type << " | "; std::cout.write( data, size); \
00060                            std::cout<<std::endl; }
00061 #else
00062     #define SNIFFWRITE(type, data, size)
00063 #endif

00068 TCPSocket::TCPSocket( std::streamsize buffersize ) throw() :
00069     std::streambuf(), std::iostream(this), socket( -1 ), buffersize(buffersize) {
00070     DOUT( "start" )
00071     inbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00072     outbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00073     setg ( inbuffer, inbuffer + buffersize, inbuffer + buffersize );
00074     setp ( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00075 }
00076 
00077 TCPSocket::TCPSocket( const std::string& address, unsigned short port, std::streamsize buffersize )
00078     throw( TCPException, NetException ) :
00079     std::streambuf(), std::iostream(this), socket( -1 ), address( address, port ), buffersize(buffersize) { 
00080     DOUT( "start" )
00081     inbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00082     outbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00083     setg ( inbuffer, inbuffer + buffersize, inbuffer + buffersize );
00084     setp ( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00085     connect();
00086 }

00088 TCPSocket::TCPSocket( const InetAddress& address, std::streamsize buffersize ) throw( TCPException ) :
00089     std::streambuf(), std::iostream(this), socket( -1 ), address( address ), buffersize(buffersize) {
00090     DOUT( "start" )
00091     inbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00092     outbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00093     setg ( inbuffer, inbuffer + buffersize, inbuffer + buffersize );
00094     setp ( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00095     connect();

00097     
00098 TCPSocket::~TCPSocket() {
00099     DOUT( "start" )
00100     disconnect();
00101     delete[] inbuffer;
00102     delete[] outbuffer;
00103     if ( socket >= 0 ) {
00104         flush();
00105         ::shutdown( socket, SHUT_RDWR );
00106         close( socket );
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void TCPSocket::disconnect() throw( TCPException ) { 
00111     DOUT( "start" )
00112     if ( socket >= 0 ) {
00113         flush();
00114     }
00115     ::shutdown( socket, SHUT_RDWR );
00116 }

00118 void TCPSocket::connect( const std::string& address, unsigned short port ) throw( TCPException, NetException ) {
00119     DOUT( "start" )
00120     disconnect();
00121     this->address = InetAddress( address, port );
00122     connect();
00123 }
00124 
00125 void TCPSocket::connect( const InetAddress& address ) throw( TCPException ) {
00126     DOUT( "start" )
00127     disconnect();
00128     this->address = address;
00129     connect();
00130 }

00132 TCPSocket::TCPSocket( int socket, const InetAddress& caller_address, std::streamsize buffersize ) : 
00133     std::streambuf(), std::iostream(this), socket(socket), address(caller_address), buffersize(buffersize) {
00134     DOUT( "start" )
00135     inbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00136     outbuffer = new char[buffersize];
00137     setg ( inbuffer, inbuffer + buffersize, inbuffer + buffersize );
00138     setp ( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00139 }
00140 
00141 void TCPSocket::connect() throw( TCPException ) {
00142     DOUT( "start" )
00143     if ( socket >= 0 )
00144         close(socket);
00145     if ( ( socket = ::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0) ) == -1)
00146         throw TCPException( "Unable to create TCP Socket" );
00147     
00148     if ( ::connect( socket, (struct sockaddr *)&address.getAddress(), sizeof( struct sockaddr ) ) == -1 ) {
00149         ::shutdown( socket, SHUT_RDWR );
00150         std::ostringstream err;
00151         err<<"Unable to connect to the host "<<address.getIPAddress()<<":"<<address.getPort();
00152         throw TCPException( err.str() );
00153     }
00154 
00155     clear();
00156     setg ( inbuffer, inbuffer + buffersize, inbuffer + buffersize );
00157     setp ( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00158 }
00159 
00160 int TCPSocket::overflow ( int c ) {
00161     DOUT( "start" )
00162     // If there aren't buffer return EOF
00163     if( !pbase() )
00164         throw NetException( "Buffer non consistent");
00165 
00166     std::streamsize sentsize;
00167     
00168     // Calculate the send size
00169     std::streamsize sendsize = pptr() - pbase();
00170     
00171     DOUT( "Sending "<<sendsize<<" byte" );
00172     DWRITE( pbase(), sendsize );
00173     
00174     // Send
00175     if ( sendsize ) {
00176         int flags = 0;
00177         #ifdef LINUX
00178         flags = MSG_NOSIGNAL;
00179         #elif MACOSX
00180         flags = SO_NOSIGPIPE;
00181         #endif
00182         sentsize = ::send( socket, (const char *)pbase(), sendsize, flags);
00183         
00184         SNIFFWRITE( "output", pbase(), sentsize )
00185         
00186         if ( sentsize < 0 )
00187             throw NetException( "Unable to send");
00188         else if ( sentsize == 0 )
00189             return EOF;
00190         else
00191             sendsize -= sentsize;
00192     }
00193 
00194     // Rebuffer data not sent
00195     if ( sendsize )
00196         memmove( outbuffer, outbuffer + sentsize, sendsize );
00197 
00198     setp( outbuffer, outbuffer + buffersize );
00199     pbump( sendsize );
00200 
00201     if( c != EOF) {
00202         *pptr() = (unsigned char)c;
00203         pbump(1);
00204     }
00205     
00206     return c;
00207 }
00208 
00209 int TCPSocket::underflow ( ) {
00210     DOUT( "start ( socket = " << socket << " )" )
00211     std::streamsize inbufferdatasize = egptr() - gptr();
00212 
00213     if ( inbufferdatasize ) {
00214         DOUT("Some data not read in the buffer inbuffer = "<<(int)inbuffer<<", gptr() = "<<(int)gptr()<<
00215             ", inbufferdatasize = "<<inbufferdatasize);
00216         memmove( inbuffer, gptr(), inbufferdatasize );
00217     }
00218     
00219     std::streamsize torecvsize = buffersize - inbufferdatasize;
00220     
00221     std::streamsize recvsize = ::recv( socket, inbuffer + inbufferdatasize, torecvsize, 0);
00222     
00223     DOUT("Received "<<recvsize<<" bytes");
00224     DWRITE( inbuffer + inbufferdatasize, recvsize );
00225     
00226     if ( recvsize < 0 ) {
00227         std::ostringstream err;
00228         err<<"Unable to receive ( recv returned "<<recvsize<<" )";
00229         RDOUT( "Received a packet of size under 0 ( " << recvsize << " ) from " << address.getIPAddress() )
00230         //throw NetException( err.str() );
00231         return EOF;
00232     } else if ( recvsize == 0 ) {
00233         RDOUT( "Received a packet of size 0 from " << address.getIPAddress() )
00234         DOUT("Connection closed");
00235         return EOF;
00236     }
00237     SNIFFWRITE( " input", inbuffer + inbufferdatasize, recvsize )
00238     setg( inbuffer, inbuffer, inbuffer + inbufferdatasize + recvsize );
00239     
00240     return (unsigned char) *gptr();
00241 }
00242 
00243 int TCPSocket::sync ( ) {
00244     DOUT( "start" )
00245     overflow(EOF);
00246     return 0;
00247 }
00248 
00249 InetAddress TCPSocket::getPeerAddress() const
00250 {
00251     struct sockaddr sa;
00252     socklen_t sal = sizeof(sa);
00253     getpeername(socket, &sa, &sal);
00254     return InetAddress(sa);  
00255 }
